default.$description: Text and icon colour for non-hyperlink items in the Footer.

heading.$description: Text and icon colour for headings in the Footer.

default.$description: Default foreground colour for links in the Footer when in a default, inactive state.

hover.$description: Foreground colour for links appearing in the SmallFooter when in a hovered (or focused) interactive state.

pressed.$description: Foreground colour for links appearing in the SmallFooter when in a selected, pressed or active state.
